message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $110. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I value this product at a higher price point. Could you do $100?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can go up to $100. How about we meet in the middle at $95? I'm willing to make a deal at that price.
